title: Student Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN)
Interview Descriptions: 12 questions that you record yourself kind of fast and nerve wrecking so be read ….. make sure you answer questions and let it upload I did it on my phone and I was having a hard time continuing to the next question and instead of saving It was skipping after I had already did the question but you could not go back so it made it looked skipped
Interview Questions: It was basic questions and situational questions

title: Student Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Very welcoming with multiple opportunities for learning and advancement. They helped me find the best department for me and one that helped to meet my goals. They were very willing to work around my school schedule as well. The Interview process was easy.
Interview Questions: What are my future goals in healthcare

title: Nurse Residency Program Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: The interviewers were not prepared to begin the interview on time. They were running a couple of minutes behind. However, I think they were pretty descriptive about the job and were open to questions.
Interview Questions: What is teamwork to you and what does it mean for the patient? Describe a time when you used teamwork. What are your strengths?

title: Nurse Practitioner Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Straight forward process and good follow through. Interview includes peers. Questions are standard but relevant. Process is not intimidating. HR evaluates your online application, then area managers reach out to continue the process
Interview Questions: They reviewed all previous experience

title: Scheduler Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Not selected for the position that I didn't get a chance to interview for and sat at a job fair and waited only to be denied. Very disappointed in the unprofessionalism of Methodist.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Licensed Physical Therapist Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: In person, panel style interview. Three people that were members of the rehab team were present to ask questions, explain the job role, and describe the work environment. The interview lasted about 30-40 minutes.
Interview Questions: What was one time that you were faced with a difficult situation, and how did you deal with that situation?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: I have submitted and not picked. Told that to be contract I had to live more than a 100 miles away. Why can’t a nurse with experience at Methodist Germantown that was very sick in 2020 and was terminated because she didn’t know about intermittent fmla be hired for contract /local travel/per diem job
Interview Questions: Why can’t a nurse with experience at Methodist Germantown that was very sick in 2020 and was terminated because she didn’t know about intermittent fmla be hired for contract /local travel/per diem job

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: It was about a 1-2 month waiting period. One phone interview, online panel interviews with 5+ employed RNs, and finally a panel interview in-person with the unit manager and PCCs
Interview Questions: What was a particularly difficult patient interaction for you and what did you gain from it?

title: MLS Student Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: The interviers were nice and asked me question related to my skills and knowledge, nothing too personal. It was a very friendly and comfortable interview and I got the job!
Interview Questions: What makes you choose this career?

title: Clinical Systems Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN)
Interview Descriptions: Long and painful. I thought I was ghosted… twice in the process.  At the time I don’t think the hiring leader  knew what they were looking for.  There were some red flags that I would walk away from now but I did not catch them at the time
Interview Questions:
All routine behavioral based interview questions 
Tell me about a time when blah and what was the outcome

title: Medical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Aug 2021
Interview Descriptions: Process was pretty straightforward. Applied online and was contacted after about a week or so to set up an interview. The application itself was pretty thorough. Had a panel interview where they asked a lot of the common questions nothing too challenging if you’re prepared to answer.
Interview Questions: Describe incident with difficult coworker and how you handled it.

title: Summer Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview questions were focused on teamwork and collaboration. The interviewer asked what I valued in a workplace setting. The interviewer asked me what my skill profile was like and how it made me a best fit for the position.
Interview Questions: What skills do you possess that would make you a great fit for the position?

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: The entire interview was straight forward and easy. I was not shocked by any questions and get comfortable answering everything that was asked. Everyone I spoke with was very friendly and made it an easy offer to accept.
Interview Questions: What interests you most about this field?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Start off with a panel interview, then you are offered a position in a unit. Super friendly, just wish new nurses could apply for a specific job. I do, however, love the fact they offer a nurse residency program.
Interview Questions: When have you used evidence based practice

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: They have a very lengthy interview process. They do not care about your time.  Interviewed with a panel and then had to wait until their CAO/COO was available.  She was texting/on her phone during the entire Zoom interview.
Interview Questions: Are you willing to take a leadership assessment that lasts 3 hours?

title: Medical Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: Laid back, relaxed. I met with 3 different women at one time and they offered 3 different positions and I was able to express which one seemed to interest me more.
Interview Questions: When is it acceptable to call out?

title: Family Nurse Practitioner Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Spoke with director of recruiting, company VP, and supervising physician regarding details and expectations of the job. Interview was laid back and everyone was very personable, friendly, and helped ease my nerves.
Interview Questions: Why do you want this job?

title: Child Life Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare in Dec 2020
Interview Descriptions: One person comes to get you from the waiting area, then they give you a tour of the facility, then they bring you into the interview room. I was in a room with 4 other people.
Interview Questions: Can you tell me about yourself?

title: Registred Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN)
Interview Descriptions: Smooth quick and included a shadowing experience. I enjoyed it and it gave me a real sense of the community at Methodist. I’m truly excited to begin my journey here.
Interview Questions: What are your biggest strengths? Weaknesses? And what does your team look like in regards to assistance on your current floor?

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: complicated application process which was then followed up with a panel interview for the entire hospital system, then unit interview which varied according to the unit you were interviewing for
Interview Questions: Why work at methodist

title: Unit Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in May 2020
Interview Descriptions: The interview was laid back. They give you a tour of the floor,and also explain and just go over job duties. They take their interviews very seriously and explain they are picky.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose Methodist?

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: They were very accommodating! I applied from a good distance away so they let me do a video interview! The video actually wasn’t working so we ended up doing a phone interview. They were all very nice and understanding throughout the whole thing.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your self. Strengths and weaknesses. Tell me about a time you had a difficult patient.

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare in Mar 2020
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed with 5 people in a room interview was straight to the point and ladies were all nice as well  I lasted about 30 min I was giving the job description
Interview Questions: What is a normal blood pressure

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Feb 2020
Interview Descriptions: I applied for the Summer Nurse Intern job in middle of January and received an email invite to the online interview process in middle of February. This interview process was very smooth and easy. It was a recorded interview set-up where it would show you the question and you'd have anywhere between 1-3 minutes to read the question and prepare your response (which is when you hit the record button). Some questions you'd be able to re-record your response but that was only 1 or 2 out of 12 questions total.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose nursing as a career?

title: Referral Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed by 3 ladies in a room . Nice down to earth women and environment. Waiting for offer hopefully. I have been looking for clear status updates but they are pretty general . Looking out for an email right now.
Interview Questions: Not normal interview questions but fairly easy . Basically worded different

title: RN Resident Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview process begins with a panel interview (6 leaders interviewed me). If you are selected for the residency, you then apply with a unit manager of where you want to work.
Interview Questions: Tell us about a time you worked as a team and it didn't work out. What did you do?

title: RN, Bsn Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Jun 2019
Interview Descriptions: Process was quick laid back and simple dont be nervous and answer as smoothly as possible especially if you are a new nurse they understand that the anxiety will take over as long as you let them know you are humble and willing to learn listen and ask questions
Interview Questions: Why did you choose methodist

title: IT Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN)
Interview Descriptions:
The process started with a phone interview with the recruiter and the hiring manager, followed by an on-site panel interview. The overall process went smoothly and took about 3 weeks. 

The recruitment team stayed in touch with me throughout the entire process and was very helpful.
Interview Questions: What is your best strength as a project manager?

title: Outpatient Scheduler Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: I had previously applied for a position at one of their standalone facilities but did not get the job. They kept my resume and called me in for this position. I had a brief phone interview then they brought me in for a panel interview of four other employees from the department.
Interview Questions: How would you handle having a lot of work to do and not having enough time to finish by the end of business?

title: IT SecurityPRN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: There were two guys interviewing me. They were both nice and respectable. They went through my resume and talked about each thing I've accomplished and projects I've done. Pretty much went over my resume, so know your resume.
Interview Questions: Why IT Security?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and heard back from them pretty quickly. I had to complete an online assessment. Then I had a panel interview with 3 people from hospital leadership and human resources, followed by a separate interview with the manager of the unit. HR was great in working with me to get an interview in my first-choice unit.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself.

title: Unit Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: they usually pull you into a room with three people and ask basic questions. wasn't hard. they give you a tour of the floor usually even if you don't get the job. recruitment team is slow at getting back with you
Interview Questions: name your worst quality

title: Insurance Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN)
Interview Descriptions: It was good interview had a panel of interviews they all were very nice and asked direct questions everyone was friendly very open I came in well prepared answered the question completely
Interview Questions: How do you handle conflict

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Aug 2017
Interview Descriptions: I participated in the nurse residency program. All new nurses must go through this. There are online short answer questions, a panel interview where they will decide which unit they think youd fit best in, then an interview with the unit manager.
Interview Questions: Describe a time where you had to deal with a difficult situation.

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Feb 2017
Interview Descriptions: Questioning about MLH and their values. How you would offer to the environment and things you are able to do. The website offers a lot of insight and your college courses prepare you for the work load . Network and if it is the online interview you can rerecord and correct.
Interview Questions: What does patient-family centered care mean to you?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: It was  standard interview process. Applied online, phone call interview and an one on one interview with the department unit manager. Job offered within 24 hours of the interviews. Knew everything up front.
Interview Questions: Standard questins

title: Nurse Extern Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: Interview was a breeze. Hiring process was a nightmare.The clinical director and one of the patient care coordinators sat in on the interview. They emphasized the company's commitment to customer service.
Interview Questions: What makes you an asset to our team?

title: CT Technologist II Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was headed by the Radiology Director.  The director was accompanied by the Lead Tech of the department.  They took turns asking questions and taking notes individually.  I was allowed to ask any questions that I had. The entire interview lasted approximately 30 minutes.
Interview Questions: Was I experienced in performing CTA exams.

title: RN ICU Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and uploaded resume. Resume populated many areas on online application making it easier to complete. There is a personality test that takes a few minutes to complete. I received a call from the unit manager the following day to schedule an interview.
Interview Questions: Describe a situation when you were a team player. How would your coworkers describe you? How would your manager describe you? Describe a situation when you went above and beyond (could be nursing or outside of nursing).

title: Project Manager I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: Two Back to back interviews with small panels comprised of Human Resources, chief operations officer, peers and functional leads. It was comforting to meet so many of the members Id be partnering with should I be offered the job. The questions were primarily situational, reminiscent of the PMP exam. The teams disposition was primarily positive.
Interview Questions: What would my current team say my best and worse qualities are

title: EDTech Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Jul 2016
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by the shift manager, the supervisor and a few of the staff members. I was given a tour of the department and shown how a typical shift would go.
Interview Questions: What Experience Do I bring and would I be an asset.

title: PBX Operator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN)
Interview Descriptions: The time frame from application, to being called back was like a month. the question were basic interview question. Just be honest, and be yourself. I applied for several job at the hospital at different positions. there is a drug test of course and physical, TB skin test and major paperwork to complete.
Interview Questions: Interview questions were pretty standard, what would you do in certain situations....

title: Nurse Extern Tier I Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Apr 2016
Interview Descriptions: panel interview with about 5 clinical directors, very casual, they all went around and introduced themselves and then we started the "questioning" they each had their own questions and then asked where i was interested in working. they were very calming in the sense of i was a new nurse extern and they all shared their experiences coming out of nursing school and they were very encouraging.
Interview Questions: why did you decide to become a nurse

title: Registered Nurse (RN) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: I had a panel interview with the clinical director, HR, and a couple staff nurses. They were really nice and welcoming. The interview was more conversational than others, which really eased my nerves! They told me a bit about the unit then asked me to tell about myself. They had forms with questions that they asked me and took notes on. Then I was shown around the unit.
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: The interview process starts with a panel interview. If the panel feels you are a good fit, your information will be forwarded to the appropriate manager. You will then be scheduled for an interview with the manager of the floor that is discussed during the panel interview.
Interview Questions: Describe a time you had a conflict with a coworker and the resolution?

title: Exempt Position Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN)
Interview Descriptions: It included taking an online 'test'.  Honestly it was not a valuable tool.   When one question asked "How many times were you late for class"   I chuckled...I've been out of high school for years.  The wording was so dated and it really was not a good representation of the organization.  The recruiter didn't even know the salary range.  She wasted both of our times.   I was not impressed.
Interview Questions: The typical questions.

title: Systems Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, panel interviewed me.  Interview lasted about 50 minutes.  I was told that I would be notified of the next phase of interviewing and that all the technical questions that I would be asked had been answered.  One month later-no further interview or contact regarding the job despite the interviewer responding to my follow up email that they would let me know next week. (It's next week).  Frustrating to wait for an answer because I was more than qualified for the job and really excited about working there.
Interview Questions: Have you ever disagreed with your boss over a decision and how did you handle it?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: Went in for a panel interview. There were only 4 people and everyone sat around a conference table. They made the interview seem very conversational which helped a lot. Everyone was very nice and the questions weren't terribly difficult, but are behavioral-based. I found out very soon afterward that I was approved to move onto the next part of the interview process.
Interview Questions: What would you do to build trust with a patient

title: Office Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was pleasant, the hiring process was a little nerve wrecking.  There is a long process I was hired in March and didn't start until May.
Interview Questions: How would I handle a stressful situation, where I am getting push back from someone.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: Comfortable, Panel Interview.  I scheduled the interview and it lasted about 30 minutes. Everyone was very pleasant and helped me feel comfortable. I received an offer the next day, which I excepted.
Interview Questions: Why did you choose Methodist?

title: Surgical Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: I applied online and got a phone call the next day. I was told then that it would be a panel interview. The Panel interview was with the nurses, Human Resources , and technicians. The Interview was not too hard and the questions were not too difficult.
Interview Questions: How do you handle conflict?

title: ER Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (San Antonio, TX) in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: Submitted resume, interviewed with ER Director, and went to orientation. The process was slow but I got the job. Orientation was really drawn out and boring. They didn't have a lot of peoples cards, documents, or packets ready.
Interview Questions: Basic questions

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: We met during the week of Christmas and I was surprised to see as many of them working. Ms. Allison did a wonderful job explaining the job and how it went along with the company's mission statement. She went through the normal interview question and had me explain what I was looking for in a company.
Interview Questions: Where did I see my career in the next five years.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Nov 2014
Interview Descriptions: Had one interview only with the floor manager. I heard directly from her before I ever heard from the nurse recruiter. The interview was very straight forward. The questions weren't too difficult. I also received a tour of the unit and was told I would be contacted by the nurse recruiter to continue with the hiring process. I was offered and accepted an informal job offer that day.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Office Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: Telephone prescreeening and panel interviews with Human Resources as well as future leader. It can be a very intimidating process and they do not get in a hurry to offer positions. Good candidates will get hired out from underneath them because of this.
Interview Questions: Give an example of a time when you had to find a solution to a problem before it became serious? What did you do? What was the outcome?

title: Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Olive Branch, MS) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: It was a drawn out process that took a while. I initially met with the doctor and the office manager and then once narrowed down I met with the head over the clinics. Once I received a call stating I was selected for the job, I met with HR to do all the paperwork and you would think that is where the negotitation would be for pay but there isn't one.
Interview Questions: If I was opposed to having prayer on monday mornings.

title: Res Therapy Sup Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process was both by phone and by a panel interview. I transfered from Texas and came to the Memphis area to continue my career in the medical field. I also was still in the military, the reserves at the time from active duty of 12 years. I continued my military service until retiring in the year 2006.
Interview Questions: What changes would I make in a medical clinic without knowing what or which type of clinic.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Jan 2014
Interview Descriptions: It was fairly short as my resume outlined past experiences.  Talk was mostly about part experiences and an overview of their unit.  The interview did include a brief tour of the work areas.
Interview Questions: Tell us about you....

title: Scheduler Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Nov 2013
Interview Descriptions: Simple and standard interview questions; the process took 2 weeks max and i was offered a position with a decent salary; try to negotiate salary if you have higher education because they will try to start you on the lower end of the budget if you don't negotiate at all
Interview Questions: Name a time you had to deal with a difficult customer and how you handled it.

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (San Antonio, TX) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: Long. 1st it's a phone interview, then you meet the recruiter, then you meet your potential boss.  The potiential boss tells you that he/she does not have input on salary, benefits etc. I was interview in March, was offered the position that same day.  My 1st day of employment was May 20th.
Interview Questions: What I kind of knowledge did I have about the department I was being interviewed for.  Luckily I visited the website a head of time.

title: Senior Director Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with recruiter; onsite interviews, travel to Memphis twice; significant difficulty coming to agreement on compensation package.  Recruitment department was extremely slow and disorganized.  Relocation and corporate housing was provided.  On-boarding was disorganized and not helpful.
Interview Questions: Why do you deserve this position

title: Patient Care Tech Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Germantown, TN) in Jan 2013
Interview Descriptions: Submitted resume online, took personality test, met with recruiter, received call from management for interview, interviewed by supervisor, given a tour of the floor, background check, drug screen, offered job
Interview Questions: Why should we hire you

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Dec 2012
Interview Descriptions: Interview was short focused on signing paperwork and years of experience and  If I was a team player,also would I be willing to do other assigned duties,also why I wanted to be employed by Methodist Healthcare
Interview Questions: Can you adhere to Methodist mission statement as far as doing your job  Will you accept pay  when can you start work. Do you get along well with all people of various backgrounds,I do.

title: Phlebotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Dec 2012
Interview Descriptions: I was hired by Methodist Health Care because i was working for a lab collecting organization,the Clinic that I was working in hired me because they wanted someone with experience for the Clinic. i was asked could I do my job pertaining to the Methodist Mission Statement and give great customer service.
Interview Questions: One question was did I form clicks with other employees

title: Registered Nurse (RN) Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Nov 2012
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was involved and drug out. It was unorganized and indirect. There were several steps and multiple conflicting responses from different people within the same chain of command
Interview Questions: Describe a situation in which you have stuck up for someone you felt was wronged

title: Transporter Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Jun 2012
Interview Descriptions: Very easy interview ! Just answer a few behavior questions and give positive feedback. You'll sit down with the lead of the department and the hiring manager. Come in professionally dresses and with a smile . I had no experience with health care when I started out and they were patient with my during training . I would recommend this company. It's laid back.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for us ?

title: Biomedical Engineering Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Methodist Le Bonheur Healthcare (Memphis, TN) in Aug 2009
Interview Descriptions: Initially interviewed on the phone by the Director of Dept. then face to face, panel interview.  Questions were behavioral interview questions and also some traditional interview questions.  After 3 days, I was called by HR to come in for drug test and physical, then once physical was complete, I was scheduled for orientation 1 week later.
Interview Questions: There was no difficult interview questions.
